title: State tribunal and support enforcement agency
context: ยง576B-103 State tribunal and support enforcement agency. (a) The family court, the child support enforcement agency established by section 576D-2, and the office of child support hearings are the tribunals of this State. (b) The child support enforcement agency is the support enforcement agency of this State. [L 1997, c 295, pt of ยง1; ren and am L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1] Note Section was former ยง576B-102.
